channel.title: Unleashed Reality V2 Old School Perfection!
channel.description:
[COLOR="DeepSkyBlue"][CENTER] [IMG]http://unleashed-reality.com/Themes/ProRed/images/theme/logo.png[/img]
[CENTER]Just a Quick Promo Video. [url=http://www.youtube.com/embed/IMfzB5mLFKQ]http://www.youtube.com/embed/IMfzB5mLFKQ[/url][/CENTER]
Welcome to Unleashed Reality 317 Version 2
This server has much to offer. As we did take a half broken source we had much to fix. Things that were broken will be listed below.
Features That have been Fixed
-Vote4cash Has been Fixed and Added
-Vote Master Point Shop (Working Vote points and Vote for cash Reward)
-Changed Home and Fixed all the Shops (Easy Fix getting to the harder ones)
-Fixed The skills (Mining,Farming,Herblore,Smithing,Fishing,Cooking,Prayer,Hunter)
-Fixed Quests and Quests Tab
-Made our Own Slayer levels other then just the boring Slayer Tower
-Fixed the Aggressiveness of the Npc's
-Fixed the Wildy Markers
-We had to make our own yell system didn't exist in the source
-Added our own Command System (Didn't exist in the Source)
-Fixed Following
-Added Donator Points and Fixed all the Hangout Zones
-More Coming Soon..
Pictures
[img]http://imgtool.in/img/agilitytickqmq.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/agilitykdk.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/agility2ndn.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/agility3npn.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/assaultapa.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/banditcampici.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/bandosvwv.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/asdfasdfasdf.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/donatorzone.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/expiramentswcw.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/highscores.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/monsterteleqoq.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/pestcontrolbob.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/pestcontrolewe.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/asdfasdf.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/questsvmv.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/runecraftinpnp.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/runecraftinqhq.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/voteshop.png[/img] [img]http://imgtool.in/img/yanilleshops.png[/img]
Forums:[url=http://unleashed-reality.com/index.php]http://unleashed-reality.com/index.php[/url]
Webclient:[url=http://www.unleashed-reality.com/ind...=webclient.php]http://www.unleashed-reality.com/ind...=webclient.php[/url]
Downloadable Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?k4f1r61ig6jxddr]http://www.mediafire.com/?k4f1r61ig6jxddr[/url]
[SIZE="5"][/SIZE] We need pkers and we have perfect pking we need you to come here and get pking started, We've tested it and it works 100%! Ags pking and even perfect Dds specs![/CENTER]

item.title: Unleashed Reality V2 Old School Perfection!
item.dc:creator: @Slimey Slimey
item.description:
@Slimey wrote:

Loveandpower:

Nothing on the server honestly catches my eye. Nonetheless good luck I suppose. Might I suggest adding some unique content?

We had this source when it was from scratch, Were onto the major things now, Were adding 100% Smithing like Clear out 100%… Were paying a high developed coder to do it because it’s advanced to add it 100% like runescape. Were also adding trivia bot right now and were opening a up a 2nd world for spawn pking. We have lots to offer on this server get on and i’ll help you out.

Read full topic
item.source: Unleashed Reality V2 Old School Perfection!
